title: El Malpais National Monument: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education         A park ranger prepares to educate students about bats at El Malpais. NPS  The powers of nature on display  El Malpais National Monument is an outdoor classroom waiting to be discovered. Currently we are not offering any ranger-guided education programs at this time. School groups can visit El Malpais on their own, and talking with a ranger about activities is recommended. Field trip options include hiking, sight seeing, caving (cave permit required), and stopping at a visitor center. Contact us today to help you plan your field trip! Please Email park staff, or call (505) 285-4641 ext. 18.
